config_technical.title: Configure Technical Options
config_technical.description:
Each command is advertised to the given adapter(s) 'Repetitions' times, at given 'Interval' (ms), and respecting a delay of 'Minimum Duration' in between 2 distinct commands.

Modify only if you know what you are doing!

Multiple adapters are SERIOUSLY DISCOURAGED, no support will be provided.
